A TripAdvisor Member
May 2016
Most awesome tour ever
I am an Airbnb host. I usually experience many tours to recommend my guests. Thumb up for OneTrip!
We stop by many times on the way to see the noodle factory, the fishing village and the rubber forest. We went through rubber forest to the tunnel, not on the highway. Awesome! Lunch and sugar cane drink were very good. Highly recommend!
